Addon.name: OneHitWonder
Addon.author: Anders 'sarf' Kronquist
Addon.email: k AT fukt DOT bth DOT se
Addon.Description: OneHitWonder is an addon that automates buffing and combat to one button. It tries to do smart buffing and combat, and uses your movement keys to autobuff you. It will be superseded by other AddOns, most notably ActionQueue, CombatSequencer and ActionQueueGlueBuffBot (with BuffBot).
